languages.text: Гибель станции "Обод Эриоха" устрашила многих пиратов и сделала торговые пути безопаснее.
The demise of Heriokh's Rim Station has intimidated many pirates and made the trade routes safer.
languages.original_text: Гибель станции "Обод Эриоха" устрашила многих пиратов и сделала торговые пути безопаснее.

traits.locale_text: The demise of Heriokh's Rim station intimidated many pirates and made the trade routes safer.
The demise of Heriokh's Rim station intimidated many pirates and made the trade routes safer.

The demise of Heriokh's Rim Station has intimidated many pirates and made the trade routes safer.

languages.text: Das Ende der Heriokh's Rim-Station hat viele Piraten verunsichert und die Handelsrouten sicherer gemacht.
languages.original_text: The demise of Heriokh's Rim Station has intimidated many pirates and made the trade routes safer.

traits.locale_text: Das Ende der Heriokh's Rim-Station hat viele Piraten verunsichert und die Handelsrouten sicherer gemacht.

languages.text: Le triste sort de la station de la Faille d'Heriokh s'est avéré dissuasif pour bon nombre de pirates et les routes commerciales sont désormais plus sûres.
languages.original_text: The demise of Heriokh's Rim Station has intimidated many pirates and made the trade routes safer.

traits.locale_text: Le triste sort de la station de la Faille d'Heriokh s'est avéré dissuasif pour bon nombre de pirates et les routes commerciales sont désormais plus sûres.

languages.text: La destrucción de la estación de Borde de Heriokh ha intimidado a numerosos piratas, volviendo más seguras las rutas comerciales.
languages.original_text: The demise of Heriokh's Rim Station has intimidated many pirates and made the trade routes safer.

traits.locale_text: La destrucción de la estación de Borde de Heriokh ha intimidado a numerosos piratas, volviendo más seguras las rutas comerciales.

languages.text: ヘリオクのリム・ステーションが消滅したことで、数多の海賊が脅かされ、交易ルートはさらに安全になった。
languages.original_text: The demise of Heriokh's Rim Station has intimidated many pirates and made the trade routes safer.

traits.locale_text: ヘリオクのリム・ステーションが消滅したことで、数多の海賊が脅かされ、交易ルートはさらに安全になった。

languages.text: 赫里奥卡之环的毁灭把许多海盗吓破了胆，贸易路线也变得更安全了。
languages.original_text: The demise of Heriokh's Rim Station has intimidated many pirates and made the trade routes safer.

traits.locale_text: 赫里奥卡之环的毁灭把许多海盗吓破了胆，贸易路线也变得更安全了。

languages.text: Heriokh'un Ağzı İstasyonu'nun yok oluşu, birçok korsanın gözünü korkuttu ve ticaret rotalarını daha güvenli kıldı.
languages.original_text: The demise of Heriokh's Rim Station has intimidated many pirates and made the trade routes safer.
